caption: 🌿✨ Breakfast Board for one☝🏼🤪🙋🏻‍♀️ Macros: 554kcals 67C 15F 38P ✨ Just goes to show you don’t have to limit yourself 🤣 either that or I have no self control when it comes to breakfast aha ✨ #breakfastboard #brunchboard ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Sometimes I’m just really undecided on what I should have for breakfast 😅 on this particular day, I was definitely split between waffles, pancakes and toast! Instead I just had miniature portions of them all! Breakfast for me, personally, is an experience! So this plate was perfect! If I ever own my own cafe one day, that’s what I’d want to present, an experience ❤️👏🏼 I used my chocolate courgette waffle and pancake recipe from my ebook - but I halved the portion of each to make a smaller batter! I then smashed some avo on toast and sliced some banana with peanut butter spread on another bit of toast! The toast I like to use is the @hovis nimble bread as each slice contains only 50kcals! I also served the mains of the dish with fresh berries, some more peanut butter and chocolate chips! ✨ Also, just to drop a little hint 😂 I’m filming my 10K calorie challenge next week, a mega breakfast board is definitely on the cards 👏🏼👏🏼 What would you have on your breakfast/brunch board? Let me known ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ The link to my breakfast all day ebook is in my bio! It’s £5.99 and contains over 30+ vegan high protein breakfast recipes, including variations, substitutes and macros! Let me know if you give any of the recipes a go by tagging me in my breakfast hashtag #leilasbreakfast ❤️ id love to see how it goes!!✨🌿

🌿✨COME WITH ME ON MY VEGAN WEEKLY FOOD SHOP ❤️ Video now live on my YouTube channel 🎥 Waffleswithleila ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨So after technical difficulties this morning which was meant to be a productive/ relaxing day off work, turned into something very stressful 😅 my laptop has finally decided to work!! But I wasn’t able to upload the video I planned to put out today ❤️ either way I’m glad I worked ahead, filmed and edited my weekly food shop over the weekend for saturdays proposed upload, but has now been uploaded today instead! ✨ I get a lot of questions on what staple items appear in my weekly food shop! What protein sources I go for, where do I buy my shopping? Do I plan my meals?!? I asked on my Instagram stories to ask me some questions about my weekly food shop and I answered them in the video! Let me know if you give the video a watch 🥰✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ What staple items do you have in your weekly food shop? Which shop do you prefer to shop at ? Let me know ❤️✨#veganfoodshop #weeklyfoodshop #foodhaul ✨🌿

🌿✨LOTUS BISCOFF CHOC CHIP PROTEIN LOAF SLICES! ✨ Macros per slice: 151kcals 19C 4F 9P (Makes 12 slices in total) ✨ using @natvialiving sweetner #ad ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Goooood morning chickpeas!! I’m teasing you on this fabulous sunny Tuesday morning with this lotus biscoff protein loaf I made over the weekend on my self care day! You can’t go wrong with a bit of baking on a self care day!what’s your favourite thing to bake?! I purposely set time aside for myself over the weekend to do things that I always say I don’t have the time for, yet I have the time to scroll on my phone for hours!! So this weekend was such a fabulous relaxing weekend which I filmed for a self care routine vlog that I’ll be uploading on SATURDAY along with this gloooorious biscoff loaf creation 🤤👏🏼 I brought a slice with me to work yesterday, plonked it in the microwave for a few seconds and it was incredible! I can only imagine it would taste just as nice with some ice cream or custard on the side too 😍✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Video goes live tonight on SATURDAY at 10:00am , subscribe to my channel so you can recreate this loaf yourselves👏🏼👏🏼 🎥❤️ Waffleswithleila for a self care day vlog! Hope you all have a wonderful Tuesday!! Who’s ready for the U.K. heat wave 👋🏼 ✨🌿

🌿✨ FULL DAY OF EATING ✨ Coming to the end of my shreddy phase at 1750kcals which I addressed in a previous post if you have a scroll where I updated you on my next steps and goals! But like I always say... it all about the volume!✨ Thought id share another FDOE on a particular day last week, because I know some people find them helpful 🥰✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Breakfast: Courgette oats topped with soy Crispies, biscoff spread and a biscoff biscuit! Love love love adding volume to my oats with courgettes! For more volume oatmeal recipes, I have a full YouTube video on different kinds! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Snack: A @myproteinuk vegan baked choc chip cookie 🤤👏🏼 if I had to choose my favourite bake cookie, it would be their salted caramel one! Links in my bio with a discount code! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Lunch: BAO BUNS! I’ve been wanting make these forever since being in lockdown! @marksandspencerfoodpr sell vegan bao buns so I picked them up last week and stuffed them with shredded oyster mushrooms which I seasoned with @skinnyfoodco bbq sauce, shredded cucumber, carrots, alfalfa sprouts and pickled red cabbage with a sprinkle of black sesame seeds✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dessert: @lotusbiscoffuk biscoff on the snack! Bought these from the @thevegankindsupermarket that I shared in my weekend vlog haul, and I’ve been loving them! I have to admit, it’s just biscoff spread and some bread sticks, but they’re super convenient to have on the go! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dinner: Polenta chips using a block of pre prepared polenta that I bought from Tesco, and served with soy mince, sweet peppers seasoned with passata, garlic and onion powder, some kale and avocado! Pretty basic dinner but all the essential macro and micronutrients 👏🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dessert: I ended the day with some vanilla yogurt (unsweetened soy yogurt mixed with 10g vanilla soy isolate protein powder) , with @skinnyfoodco apricot jam, some chocolate soy crispies and blueberries ✨

🌿✨SINGLE SERVE MARBLE PROTEIN CUPCAKE CAKE ✨ Macros: 235kcals 24C 4F 25P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ I love love love myself a single serve bake! It makes less mess, it’s fab if you just fancy one particular snack at one moment in time and it’s so cute making a tiny batter of a single serve portion 😅 Ive made other other single serve cupcakes in the past including a matcha single serve cupcake and blueberry lemon, both on my YouTube channel, but I loved the idea of creating a marble effect!! So, I made this single serve marble protein cupcake for my new YouTube video that I uploaded on Saturday ❤️🎥 Waffleswithleila ! All of the recipes, ingredients and macros for all 6 single serve recipes are included in the description box of the video!✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging and sharing in your posts and stories! I’d love to know what you think 🥰✨🌿

🌿✨Double Chocolate chip French toast bagel skillet with chocolate ice cream 🤪 who says you can’t have ice cream for breakfast ... I did also say I was on a bagel hype recently 🤷🏻‍♀️✨ Macros: 511kcals 75F 9F 30P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ I made this french toast bagel skillet on Friday after a lower bod workout 💪🏼 set me up real good for a day of work! I used my french toast recipe in my ebook, all I did in replace was use a bagel to soak up the mixture and added cacao powder to the batter!! I chopped the bagel up into quarters, allowed to soak in the french toast batter, popped it in the oven for 20 mins to crisp and Viola 👌🏼 ✨ I then of course went wild with the toppings and added a scoop of @breyersdelightsuk chocolate hazelnut ice cream (my current vegan ice cream fave at the moment), some chocolate chips and raspberries! ✨ Today I’m filming my self care routine for youtube ❤️🎥 Waffleswithleila! ✨ Ive dedicated this whole day to sitting back, relaxing and chill time! Also spending time with my dad ❤️✨ wishing you all a fabulous Father’s Day! ✨ It’s been calm morning so far, I’ll be taking a trip to my own eyelash and fake tan salon soon 🤣🤣 hopefully they turn out well 🤞🏼✨ I’ll be uploading on Tuesday! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨My breakfast all day recipe ebook link can be in my bio! It’s £5.99 and includes over 30+ high protein vegan breakfasts with substitutes, variations and macros included! I know I share a lot of different breakfasts on my feed and YouTube because my imagination is endless when it comes to breakfast, but my ebook provides a foundation of where my imagination comes from/ adaptations of the recipes to make new ones! ✨🌿

🌿✨FULL BOD WORKOUT 🔥 ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ 1000% ready to get back to the gym and lift some real weights, get back In my mojo and gain some muscle 💪🏼really missing my 130kg 5x5 hip thrusts 😂 buttt in saying that, during this time, I’ve been digging my home workouts with the equipment that I do have, just making do! I’ve also been super on it with my workouts, more than I thought I would be - at the start I thought I wasn’t going to enjoy it but it hasn’t been so bad after all (nothing beats the gym still though 🤣)✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🏋🏻‍♀️ Workout (4x10): ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 BB RB squats SSW/ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Reverse BB lunges ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 OH DB tricep extensions SSW/ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Ball hamstring curls ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Lat pulldown ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Leg extensions finished off with 30 skips with a skipping rope ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🏋🏻‍♀️ Core workout (3x12): ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 full length leg raises, weighted pass overs, 4 bicycles into jackknifes, flutter kicks (x20), scissor kicks (x20) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨Save this workout and let me know if you give it a go ❤️ wearing: @doyoueven @doyouevenwomen seamless collection, they’ve got a restock on some bits and bobs, check out my automated 10% discount link in my bio for you post lockdown, gym comeback 🔥 outfit ✨🌿

🌿✨ SINGLE SERVING CINNAMON SUGAR HIGH PROTEIN PRETZEL ✨ Macros: 209kcals 25C 1F 23P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ New single serving DIY high protein vegan snack recipes is now live on my YouTube channel ❤️ 🎥 Waffleswithleila ✨ I love my protein bars, I love my popcorn, I love my yogurt, biscuits and alll kinds of packaged snacks but when I have the time to make my own snack, I find it so much more enjoyable!! Can anyone else relate with that? ✨ The video includes 6 different high protein snack recipes! If I had to choose my favourite, it would defo be the chocolate marble single serve cupcake or cinnamon sugar pretzel! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨Let me know if you give the video a watch or recreate any of the recipes by tagging me in your stories and posts ❤️ can’t wait to know what you think! Next YouTube upload - Tuesday!! ✨🌿

🌿✨ Do you like drinking your calories? 👇🏼👇🏼✨ I get a lot of questions on whether it’s “good” or “bad”! ✨simple answer is, nothing’s good or bad! ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨How you choose to consume your calories is completely up to you! When I went through my eating disorder I feared drinking my calories, I didn’t/ couldn’t and wouldn’t have smoothies or milkshakes, soups, milk in my teas or coffee, I never had juices or fizzy drinks!✨ Personally, drinks don’t fill me up, so now I tend to have smoothie bowls as oppose to a smoothie drink more often then not! ✨ I don’t fear drinking calories as oppose to when I did, I just prefer eating solids! ✨ Or if I’m drinking a smoothie because I feel like it, I’d bulk it up with chia/ flax seeds, avocados or oats! ✨ you don’t need to question or justify whether “you can” drink your calories! Of course you can! ✨ I do love myself a milky matcha latte or frothy coffee for sure 👏🏼✨ The only thing I’d say is that it’s easy to drink your calories without even realising and the fact that it doesn’t satisfy your hunger! ✨ I’m definitely not the type to only have a protein shake after a workout ... defo not! It just won’t cut it! ✨ Especially after a workout; carbs, fats and protein all have to be involved - not only to satisfy my hunger but to replenish my muscle fibres and restore my glycogen levels ✨ what’s your opinions let me know ? ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨Sending a big thankyou to @amtcoffee for gifting me vouchers to use at their cafes located at my work place and other hospitals! Love their new vegan chocolate coconut milkshake 🤤👏🏼 it was like one big slushieee! Also shoutout to my colleague for the mini photoshoot we had before work 🤪 #gifted ✨🌿

🌿✨Banoffee pie stuffed bagel 🤤👏🏼✨ Ive really been on a bagel hype recently! Thiccccc bagels! Thin bagels are fab aswell but that’s more of a snack 🤣 In fact... a bread hype which you may be able to tell on my feed 😅 I mean... bread is sooo fabulous rightttt?!? I even have pitta bread and hummus today as part of my lunch 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️ What’s your favourite kind? ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨@nushfoods kindly sent out a little care package to make their banoffee pie recipe, but when I was thinking what to have for breakfast today, I was just feeeeeling the idea of a banoffee stuffed bagel, so we went with it and it turned out fabulous!!✨ I used 30g of @nushfoods cream cheese mixed with some vanilla protein powder, some slices of banana, @naturescharm coconut caramel spread and chopped up pieces of @ombarchocolate 🤤👌🏼 defo hit the spot this morning after a legs session!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨Let me know your go to bagel stuffing, sweet or savoury!!! ✨ Have a fab friyayheyheyyy peeps ✌🏼#gifted ✨🌿
🌿✨ Felt this outfit (if I can call it that 😅) was a vibe, so I’m sharing it 🤣 repping @myproteinuk still 🤪✨🌿

🌿✨Jammmmy white chocolate bowl of hot comforting oats 🤤👏🏼✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨A hot bowl of oats on a gloomy rainy day, with toppings that bring the bowl to life... so good!! Soo yummy! So fabuloussss! My favourite way to bulk up a bowl of oats and I would say is my go to is grated courgette and chia seeds! Of course there are other ways which I made a whole YouTube video on “volume oat combinations”, however grated courgette is my go to and would be my fave to add volume! ✨ Whenever I have a bowl of oats, it really does me well for a good 3-4 hours before I need to eat again, especially with the added chia seeds and courgette, making the bowl nutrient rich, high fibre and slower released sustainable carbs! ✨ Also, oats are so low calorie, which means I could have a much bigger portion as oppose to a bowl of cereal that probably won’t fill me up the same way!! And of course, oats make a fabulous base for lots and lots and lots and lotssss of toppings.. which you know I’m a fan of 🤣 I topped my bowl with banana slices, @koro_uk soy Crispies, @skinnyfoodco raspberry jam and @vego_chocolate white chocolate! Swipe for the texture 🤤👏🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨For all sugar free jams, spreads and syrups, use my discount code LEILA4THREE which allows you to get the 4th product free on @skinnyfoodco products (please be aware, although I work with them, I don’t support their slogan of #notguilty .... it’s a load of poop 💩 I just love the taste of their products and I’d recommend them - just not the marmalade jam - please no 🤢) ✨🌿

🌿✨CaLoRieS, Calories, CALORIES, Kcals, FOOD! Here’s an update✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Disclaimers: As I always mention, my calories, your calories, Bob and Sally’s calories will be different! I can’t exaggerate enough how un-beneficial it is to copy how much someone requires whether that be to lose weight, gain or maintain weight! Another thing, everything I say comes from my experience and personal advice, whether you agree or disagree, is up to you, all I share is what has worked for me so take it like that! If you’re currently suffering from an eating disorder, you need to seek medical advice. Also, whether you track or not, there’s no right way to fitness so long as your feeding and fuelling yourself properly, deprivation is not cool! It’s up to you whether you like or dislike tracking calories, no shade thrown! Finally, if you do track, don’t feel like your trapped, restricted or need to obsessively follow it! It’s a tool and guide and not a way of undereating to see “quick results” ✨ For more detail on this subject, watch my “how to see progress” on YouTube as I’m limited to the word limit instagram allows on here! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🙋🏻‍♀️ Personal stats and goals: Age: 22 Height: 5ft on the dot 🙃 Weight: 48kg Current steps: 15-25k steps per day Training: 5-6 times a week! Current calories: 1750kcals (“cutting” kcals) Current calorie goals (post 10K calorie challenge) : reverse diet up to maintenance (explained in my YouTube video) - which for me is 1950kcals, when gyms re open, I plan to stay at maintenance and potentially be in a caloric surplus to fuel the increase load I’ll be lifting (miss that life 😭) !✨ As I mentioned, I will be light heartedly and for entertainment purposes only, be participating in the 10kcal calorie challenge for youtube - please note this isn’t something to aspire to, it’s completely unhealthy! 🌿✨ Guys, gals, gentlemen, PEOPLE! If you follow me and didn’t know how much I love these @myproteinuk vegan baked cookies, where have you been living 🤣🤪✨ Macros for this Giant baked cookie choc pod (Meal sized serving for one/ breakfast on the go ): 537kcals 50C 20F 37P✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ My virtual Australian twinnn sistaaa from another mister, aka @run2food and I were both inspired by each other to recreate one of our recipes from each with a twist!! (Btw my fellow foodie friends food posts are incredible!!!)✨ so this is my variation of Michelle’s single serve snickers pod!! ✨ in the original recipe, Michelle used a soft protein bar as the base, but I went for a @myprotienuk vegan baked cookie and it banged 👏🏼 here’s the recipe 👇🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - Meal sized serving for 1 - ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Base: one @myproteinuk vegan baked cookie ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Filling: 15g @myproteinuk smooth peanut butter, 2/ 3 tbsp water and 10g @myproteinuk vegan vanilla soy isolate protein powder ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Topping: 15g dark chocolate chips and 10g @myproteinuk vegan vanilla soy isolate protein powder ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: for the base, press the baked cookie into a mini dome shaped bowl to form the cookie cup and Place it in the microwave for 20 seconds. Working quickly, take it out of the microwave and further press down to form the shape of the cup and leave to cool. Whilst cooling, make the filling by mixing the two ingredients together! For the topping, melt the chocolate and then quickly whisk in the protein powder! Once the cup is cooled, place in the filling and topping! ENJOY ❤️👏🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ For all @myproteinuk @myvegan products, I am a sponsored ambassador of theirs, so I have a discount code and link in my bio ❤️✨ using my link helps support me with the brand, the discount code is there for you guys to save your dolllla which is always a bonus especially to save for a post lockdown EXIT holiday abroad 🤣 I’m readyyyyy for it aha! ✨ #cookie #vegancookie #cookiedough #cookiecups ✨🌿

🌿✨Full day of eating without protein supplements & Top vegan protein sources for a high protein diet! I also tried Chloe tings ab workout 🤣✨ New video live on my YouTube channel 🎥❤️ Waffleswithleila ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Within the video I share the importance of protein to support certain training routines but I also explain that protein isn’t a superior macro for building muscle or losing weight if that’s what you desire! A lot of people don’t have access or prefer not to use protein powder so I share how to implement protein within your diet without the use of supplements! ✨ Cutting update: I’ve been in a cut now for 2 months! I.e. I have slowly been reducing my calories from my maintenance calories by 50kcals every two weeks to reach my cutting kcals which I have maintained for 1 month now - for more information on calories, macros and how to effectively and sustainably see results, I have a whole video on my channel labelled “Reverse dieting”! ❤️ As I always highlight, everyone’s calories, journey and goals are different, so never feel the need to compare but I like to share for reference! Currently I’m cutting on 1750 kcals - I won’t be reducing any further than this because there’s no need to! I’m already below my maintenance by 200kcals - increasing the deficit via training and my steps! A lot of people think you have to drastically cut your calories to be able to see results! NOT AT ALL! It actually is very ineffective and not sustainable to do so!! 2/300 kcals below your maintenance is more than enough if you love food 🤣 personally I increase the deficit via exercise (which I don’t track- I just put all my efforts in) ✨ you NEVER want to be in too large of a deficit or overtraining, it’s damaging and counter intuitive! Trust me... I’ve been there, done that, learnt from it and came out of it with a lesson learnt!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Let me know if you’d like a whole caption on what steps I’ll be taking next, when I’m ending my cut, how I’m coming out of it , what will I be doing, what my next goals are?!? I’d love to share if people are interested ❤️ ALSO, I’m now working with @beaybl ✨ link is in my bio ✨🌿

🌿✨CHOC RASPBERRY TRAY BAKE using @koro_uk choc covered raspberries #gifted✨ macros: 181kcals 24C 8P 6F ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Yesterday I got busy in the kitchen as I wanted to make homemade snacks for the week 😅 so I ended up making the Jammy bars I’ve already posted, and this choc tray bake! ✨ I have so many packaged snacks at home, which is fab and I love those snacks so much! But I haven’t made homemade snacks in quite a while and just fancied having them instead of what I’d usually reach for in the week ie. vegan baked cookies, carb crusher and other protein bars, biscuits and all! ✨ I tried these choc cake squares yesterday and they’re sooo chocolateyy 🤤 perfect snack to have during the day 👏🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - serves 9 squares - ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Wet ingredients: 250ml almond milk, 100g unsweetened soy yogurt, 50g @koro_uk dark choc chips ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Dry ingredients: 200g spelt flour (you can use plain or self raising), 50g protein powder, 15g @koro_uk cacao powder ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 100g frozen raspberries ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 70g @koro_uk choc covered raspberries ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 1/4 tsp baking powder, some salt and squeeze of a lemon ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: melt the dark chocolate chips and combine with the wet ingredients! Mix the dry ingredients together and then blend with the wet ingredients, baking powder and frozen raspberries! Place the batter in a baking tray lined with non stick baking paper! Top with the choc covered raspberries! Pop in the oven for 20 mins on 180c! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨If you’re looking for an online bulk buy #healthhhhh store, @koro_uk is your go to! They kindly gifted me some of their bulk ingredients such as these choc dried freeze raspberries, chocolate chips, cacao powder, flax seeds, soy Crispies, spelt flakes, buckwheat and other little bits and bobs! My last gifting from them was my blender which I swear by 👏🏼 best blender everrrr the “sir mix a lot” I have a discount code and link in my bio ❤️✨🌿

🌿✨JAMMY FUDGE BLONDIES ✨ macros: 147kcals 22C 2F 10P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Freshly bakes out of the oven this morning! A jammy top and a fudgy base! How does that sound! Place onto a baking tray lined with non stick baking paper and place the jam on top! Create swirls through the batter and jam top. Pop in the oven for 15-20mins on 180c! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ My affiliate link for the @skinnyfoodco will be linked in my bio and on my stories! 🌿✨SINGLE SERVE BLUEBERRY VEGAN PROTEIN SOUFFLÉ PANCAKE WITH VANILLA CUSTARD✨ macros: 266kcals 37C 4F 21P ✨ #vegansoufflepancake ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Ever since I created my protein soufflé pancakes for a week of vegan breakfasts YouTube video I made, I’ve been wanting/ having the recipe as a single serve snack for my pre workout meals every so often! Recently I tried out blueberry and custard 👏🏼🤤✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - serves 1- ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 30g plain flour (can be subbed with spelt, or self raising flour) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 15g @myproteinuk blueberry and cinnamon vegan blend protein powder ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 3G chia seeds ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 75ml almond milk ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 50g blueberries, 10g @natvialiving sweetener, some baking powder, squeeze of a lemon and salt ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 I also served with 80g of @alpro vanilla custard👏🏼 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: you can find the recipe and how I form the soufflé shape on my YouTube in my “week of vegan breakfasts” Waffleswithleila ❤️🎥✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

Davies✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Ive really stuggled to put what had happened into my own words! I may not know the perfect thing to say or do but I know it’s better to speak up rather than to remain silent! I own up in saying that I’ve left it this long to share it on my feed and talk about it purely because it has really baffled me! I’ve shared it on my story but realise that stories are only temporary and are not seen by a wider audience in comparison to post! Over the past few days, it has come to my attention, that my platform is a voice and I can potentially educate or raise awareness to others in regards to George floyd and the many others that have suffered! It really really really disheartens me to think how any human can be treated in such way! Being born and raised in London, in particular central London where it is so diverse and multicultural, I did not grow up into thinking such thoughts about another race or even religion! Never would I treat anyone differently, or discriminate someone based on their background or skin colour and it sickens me to think that there are still people out there that do! I know I’m only one person and a single voice, but I’d like to make an impact in some way, whether that be big or small! So I urge you all to sign petitions, to self educate, to share the message, to read and listen so that we stand stronger together! Let me know how you’re contributing, whether that be sharing the message or in some other way?!? ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨My new youtube video is now live on my channel! It’s a weekend in my life: in quarantine! It includes a chocolate chip tahini cookie recipe, full body workout, my weekly food shop, @thevegankindsupermarket haul, youtube/ Netflix suggestions and just an overall chill/ get to know about me! In light of the worlds current affairs, the money earned from the Google Adsense will all be donated to the @mnfreedomfund donation ✨ 🎥❤️ Waffleswithleila- the links in my bio and on my stories! ✨ ✨ #strongertogether ✨🌿

🌿✨ 3 Ingredient Zaatar Babka ✨ macros: 269kcals 35C 10F 9P✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ We’ve seen my chocolate Babka swirl loaf, my single serve chocolate peanut butter chocolate chip Babka and single serve matcha Babka! Now we’re going Lebanese ✌🏼 with my single serve zaatar babka! ✨ as I’m half Lebanese, when we visit Lebanon - zaatar is typically a traditional breakfast to have and it’s one of my faves!! ✨ at home we have a big tub of zaatar which could last a life time 🤣 from Lebanon 🇱🇧 but you can find this mixed spice in most supermarkets nowadays, online or in continental shops! ✨ Have you tried zaatar before? Let me know! Also, raise your hand 🙋🏻‍♀️ if you’re Lebanese!! Marhaba 👋🏼 ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - serves 1- ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 50g plain flour ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 30g unsweetened soy yogurt (or vegan alternative) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 1 tbsp of zaatar mixed with 1 tbsp olive oil ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: For the dough, mix the flour and yogurt together as well as a squeeze of a lemon, pinch of baking powder and salt! The method on how I made the twist of the babka, is on my YouTube channel, so check out the video for that on how to twist the Babka and form it’s shape! Fill the Babka with the zaatar mix, pop it in the oven for 15 mins on 180c until crisp! 🤤 I served this Babka as part of my dinner, which I had some lettuce, alfalfa sprouts, cucumber and pickled red cabbage with it! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ FULL DAY OF EATING ✨ It was defo a tanning day today for me ✌🏼 loved the sun! ✨ Typically I spend my Sunday lounging around which I did today, I managed to reach 10K steps just by walking around the house, supermarket and morning LISS, but I never compensate my calories whether I’m resting or more active on particular days! 🌿✨Swipe to see what I want you to see VS. What I also want you to see!!!✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Your body is a reflection of your life. Everybody has a different story, we should never try and hide it or be ashes of it either!!✨ I’ve had a tonne of messages about how to get rid of “rolls” and “stretchmarks” as if I don’t have them! Of course I do! I’ve come from a history of yo yo dieting, jumping from one diet to the next and little depriving myself for an extended period time! This lead to stretch marks - which is where your skin is pulled by rapid growth and so it looses elasticity as the normal production of collagen is lost ✨ and thats why I love that quote of “your body is a reflection of your life” and it comes with a story!! ✨ it’s completely normal to have rolls, to have stretch marks and to all kinds of claimed “imperfections” which is hidden on this platform! ✨ it all stems from comparison, but there’s no need for it! Even though that can be easier said than done! Focus on your own body and your own journey! ✨ If i, or someone else wants to post a picture posed and flexed in a bikini or a cute gym set, I feel like we can without having to explain ourselves but it is nice to see that we all have little insecurities about ourselves that should be embraced ✌🏼 our bodies are a temple and should be respected! And I wish someone drilled that into my head when I was younger! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ I thought I’d attach a little throwback to show the extremes of my journey, it wasn’t until I came to the acceptance of myself mentally and physically that I focused on what I wanted and achieved it! Every time I look back, I still get shook, but I always tell myself, I did that!! And I’m proud of it! So when I post photos of me posed and flexed, I worked for that and I’m not going to hide it #sorrynotsorry ! Please do unfollow if that’s not your tea! Take away message ... YOU IS BEAUTIFUL GURL! It’s not cringe and it’s not vein to say it to yourself, in fact SING IT to yourself! You is beautiful!! HAve a fabuloussss Friday! This will be my attire for the whole day 🤣👏🏼 clear skiesss today baby!! ✨ #throwback #transformation ✨🌿

🌿✨ Giant single serve Baked Vanilla Protein Cheesecake 🤪✌🏼✨ macros: 539kcals 43C 20F 45P (includes toppings) ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Cake, cake, cake 🍰 I attempted to make a single serve protein cheesecake, and I gotta say, it turned out pretty dam fine 🤤 I’m defo going to be recreating this myself in different flavours! I’ve nailed the base recipe 👏🏼 give it a go peeps! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - serves 1- ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ For the Base: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 2 crumbled up weetabix, 1/2 cup water ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 30g @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 10g @myproteinuk powdered peanut butter ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 5g @natvialiving sweetner ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ For the filling: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 70g unsweetened soy yogurt, 50g @nushfoods vegan cream cheese, 5g Coconut oil, 5g @natvialiving sweetener ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ Toppings: I used half a passion fruit, strawberries and 5g desiccated coconut ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Mix all of the base ingredients together and place in a non stick, relatively deep dish. Mix all of the filling ingredients together and place on top of the base. Place the oven proof dish in the oven for 20-25 mins of 180c. Take out the oven, allow to cool and remove from the dish. Top with all the toppings in the world 🌍 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! 🌿✨SINGLE SERVE CHUNKY PROTEIN COOKIE! Macros: 226kcals 17C 3F 32P ✨ #singleserve #proteincookie #vegancookie ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ This recipe can be found in my breakfast all day ebook! It’s recipe number 33 for reference! The great thing about the recipes is that they’re so versatile and can be altered in many different ways! Just like this cookie recipe!! You can replace the vanilla soy isolate with a strawberry protein powder, and replace the choc chips with some fresh or dried strawberries to make a strawberry cheesecake cookie! You can alternatively use a chocolate protein powder to make a double chocolate chip single serve cookie! Maybe you fancy a bit of matcha? Replace the vanilla soy isolate the recipe asks for with a matcha protein powder or add 1/4 tsp matcha to the cookie mixture instead, and replace the choc chips with raspberries to make a matcha raspberry cookie 👅 ✨ so many combos you can incorporate and work off of one recipe!! ✨ you can even use the cookie to crumble up on a thick and luscious smoothie bowl 🤤 so appropriate for this weather right now! #leilasbreakfast ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ My breakfast all day ebook is £5.99 and contains over 30+ recipes with substitutions, variations and all ingredients, methods and macros listed for each! ✨ The link for my ebook is in my bio ❤️ Let me know if you give this recipe a go! ✨🌿

I love love love a smoothie bowl with toppings of course! This recipe can be found in my “5am morning routine” video on YouTube 🎥 Waffleswithleila ✨ ive really been loving the blueberry and cinnamon blend 👏🏼👏🏼✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Mid morning snack: A @myvegan carb crusher! I melted it in the microwave for 20 seconds for it to become all soft and incredddible! (If you watched my morning routine - I had this full day of eating whilst making that video, so below is the remaining of the day! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Lunch: Deconstructed burrito bowl, which is possibly my favourite lunch to have especially when the weather is nice! I placed in a bowl, lettuce, cumber, alfalfa sprouts and chargrilled sweetcorn, along with some corn pop chips, homemade guacamole and a tomato bean soy mince ✨ for the guac, I smashed half an avocado and sprinkled on top some garlic and onion powder, I then combined with chopped up onion and tomato! ✨ for the mince, in a pot I mixed together some tomato purée, some black beans and some soy mince along with water and some spices! ✨Dessert: I felt like a bowl of oats so I made a snack sized portion of the recipe I shared in my morning routine video, except I topped with frozen raspberries and chocolate pieces! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dinner: Polenta with vegetable broth seasoned shiitake mushrooms! I’m going to be filming a week of vegan dinners for my youtube soon, and this particular dinner will definitely be featured! It was amazing 🤤✨Dessert: some unsweetened soy yogurt mixed with a @myproteinuk flavour drop and Cheerios ✨

🌿✨Chocolate protein Bourbon biscuit oat cake!! ✨ Macros: 537kcals 56C 12F 53P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ I’m back on the biscuit hype, this time with the British classic bourbon choc biscuit 👌🏼 I use to have these allll the time back in primary school! They use to give biscuits out during playtime 🤪 until Jamie Oliver jumped on to the scenes and the biscuits became pieces of fruit instead aha! #health ✌🏼 Honestly can’t tell you how long it’s been since I’ve had one of these and they’re accidentally vegan too 👏🏼 this bowl cake was a joy of a breakfast I had! Here’s the recipe!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE - serves one person- ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 55g oats ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 10g @myproteinuk chia seeds (or flax seeds) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ 40g @myproteinuk dark chocolate vegan blend ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ enough water to make thick oats ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 5️⃣ For the choc peanut butter layering: I mixed 5g @myproteinuk cacao powder with 10g @myproteinuk powdered peanut butter and some water to form a butter texture (you can use any spread you like alternatively) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 6️⃣ 1 choccc biscuit! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl. Place in the microwave for 2 mins. Place in the fridge for the following morning. Flip on to a plate and top with love ❤️ I topped my chocoooo overnight oatmeal cake with a choc peanut butter layer and Bourbon biscuit 🤪✌🏼 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ VEGAN PROTEIN POWDERS! Vegan blends and soy isolates! ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨This isn’t a post saying you neeeed protein powder to build muscle, it’s often “sold” with that intention but honestly, if you get enough protein from your diet naturally, you can still build muscle (in conjunction with a caloric surplus and employment of progressive overload)! HOWEVER!! protein powder is super convenient, makes a fabuloussss ingredient in a lot of recipes, it’s super versatile and tastes absolutely delicious too!! Eg. I use them in my pancakes, waffles, oats, smoothie bowls and baked goods! ✨ So I thought I’d recommend my @myproteinuk @myvegan faves! ✨ Also, my new youtube video “Reverse dieting - My experience” has now been uploaded and is ready ✨ I talk about the right amount of protein for you in the video aswell ✌🏼 I know the video topic was highly requested! So let me know in the comments if you found it helpful! 🎥 Waffleswithleila ❤️✨ My favourites: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ Vanilla soy isolate 2️⃣ Matcha soy isolate 3️⃣ strawberry soy isolate 4️⃣ Dark chocolate vegan blend 5️⃣ Cacao orange vegan blend 6️⃣ Blueberry and cinnamon vegan blend 7️⃣ Coffee and walnut vegan blend 8️⃣ Carrot cake vegan blend ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ You’ve probably seen me rave about the vanilla soy isolate, as it truly is my fave ❤️👏🏼 so that would be my top suggestion! I’ve recently tried the two new flavours of cacao orange and blueberry cinnamon - I was pleasantly surprised at both, the only thing with those is that they’re less versatile, so it depends if you’re looking for a specific taste or something you can adapt like the vanilla soy isolate! For the chocolate flavoured proteins, I’m not a fan of the chocolate soy or vegan blend but I do love the dark chocolate vegan blend ✨ I hope you found this helpful!! Let me know if you’ve tried any and which is your favourite flavour? ✨ Wearing @myproteinuk ✨ My discount code and link is in my bio - my specific link helps me with my protein so I really appreciate it when you use my link! 🥰✨🌿

🌿✨CHIA JAM FILLED MINI PROTEIN SNICKERDOODLE DONUT BALLS WITH @Manilife_ PB AND CHIA JAM DIP!!! Name a better combo 😎👊🏻 ✨ Macros: 528kcals 48C 15F 46P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨You can’t say you haven’t fancied donuts for breakfast before ? 🤪 I definitely have!! And these mini chia jam filled ones do the trick just well 👌🏼 best thing about them, you can make them in your kitchen @ home and eat them all to yourself 🤤👌🏼✌🏼 #stayhome ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE (serves one person- makes 9 balls) : ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ For the dough: 60g flour ( you can use one: spelt, buckwheat, plain, self raising, gluten free, oat flour - not almond or coconut flour) , 30g @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate, 50g @alpro unsweetened soy yogurt, 2 tbsp of water, dash of lemon juice, baking powder and salt ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ For the chia jam: 100g frozen berries of your choice (I used raspberries) and 5g @myproteinuk chia seeds ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ Cinnamon sugar coating: some cinnamon and @natvialiving sweetner or a sugar of your choice eg. A different sweetner, white sugar or Coconut sugar ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ @manilife_ peanut butter Orr your fave PB but this peanut butter is on a next level of peanut butttternesss! 👌🏼 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: First, make the chia jam by placing the frozen berries into the pot with the chia seeds and a dash of water. All the berries to stew down and for the chia seeds to absorb the liquid! Mix the ingredients to form the dough and roll into a ball! Separate into nine equal balls (or larger ones if you prefer!) and flatten to fill with jam! For the remaining jam, place them in a dipping pot! Mix the ingredients for the cinnamon sugar on a plate and roll each ball in to cover. Roll them up once filled with 1/2 a tsp of jam each and pop them into the oven for 15- 20 mins on 180c. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ Matcha protein pudding topped with @sambazon scoopable acai (#gifted), @alpro vanilla custard , @vegetarian_express granola, goji berries and some banana slices ✨ Total Macros: 491kcals 60C 9F 44P✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨I often get asked, how do I think of my breakfasts which are... let’s say, not your average 🙃 For this breakfast I can explain 😅 soo!! I’m meant to be flying to Sydney, Australia in November for my birthday and I’m in two minds between whether I’d be able to go or not because of the worlds current affairs 💔 Australia is such a dreammmm destination for me and I’ve always said since I was a little chickpea, that I’d love to go! So when I finally booked it earlier this year, I was so happy!! One of the many many many reasons why I think Australia (in particular places like Byron bay, Melbourne, Brisbane, Sydney), is a dream for me is because of the beautiful and wonderful cafes they have there 😍 I constantly see them on my explore feed and I find them super inspiring!! Which led me to create this dish for my breakfast which was particularly inspired by a cafe called @thetradesmancafe in Melbourne! ✨ The pudding is actually my chocolate protein pudding recipe from my ebook - I just swapped out the choc protein powder and cacao powder with the @myproteinuk matcha soy isolate! (The link to my breakfast allll day ebook is in my bio) ❤️✨ I then decided to decorate it as if I was sitting in an instagrammable cute Australia cafe in the sun... a girl can dream 🤣 ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Have you been to Australia before? 🌿✨ HOMEMADE VEGAN MOZERELLA STICKS! macros per stick: 70kcals 7C 3F 0P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ I included this meal in a FDOE post last week and mentioned I’d post the recipe! HERE IT IS!! I made these vegan mozzarella sticks and they worked out well!! The cheese I used was @violife_foods cheese! They’re my favourite vegan brand of cheese! They have a wide range included grated cheese, sliced cheese and block cheese! For this recipe you’ll need the block to be able to cut them into sticks!! It’s the only cheese I find that melts really well, doesn’t taste like plastic and is enjoyable!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE (makes 3 sticks - 1 serving size): ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 1 slice bread toasted ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 10g flour ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ Just some water on the side to dip ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ 45g @violife_foods cheese block ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Blend the toasted bread slice in a blender to make into bread crumbs. Place the formed bread crumbs in a dish and season with garlic and onion powder. Place flour into a separate dish and water in another. Cut the block into 3 equal sticks. Place one stick first in the water, roll in the flour, and repeat, then roll in the breadcrumbs and pop onto a baking tray lined with baking paper. Repeat this process for the remaining two sticks! Pop into the oven for 15-20 mins on 180c and enjoy the melt 🤤🤤 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨HOMEMADE VEGGIE PATTIES with spicy tomato dip ✨ Macros for each: 93kcals 16C 5P 0F ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ So update from the government ... you can go out but not out out 🙃 ohh borris #stayhome kids, this is definitely not the end! Whether we on level “4” or the R or not, the virus remains! So please don’t give in ❤️ remember it’s an effort we all need to make together! I know it’s hard but let’s think about the positives, such asssss the excess time to make home cooked meals!! Who is loving it? 🙌🏼 personally, being creative with my meals are making me sane!! Made these patties, they’re super yummy and perfect to add along side a meal or have as a savoury snack if you fancy!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 40g spelt flour - any wheat or gluten free flour, no coconut or almond ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 50g peas ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ 50g blackbeans ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ 50g sweetcorn ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 5️⃣ 50ml almond milk ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: mix all of the ingredients in a bowl. Form into 3 equal patties. Add some seasonings of choice, I used salt, pepper, garlic, onion powder. Pop on a non stick baking tray and all to cook on each side! To make the dip I used 1 tbsp of tomato purée and used the seasonings: chilli flakes, cayenne pepper, smoked paprika and garlic powder. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ FULL DAY OF EATING ✨ Total kcals: same as previous - refer to my YouTube vids for an explanation! I don’t really like to just post it without an explanation before people assume that my kcals are something to aspire to - they’re not, they’re calories for me and my goals, completely different to yours! ✨ also, as you can tell, what I eat varies, I like being creative with my foods and explore different recipes! ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Breakfast: I made cookie dough protein fluff which the recipe will be featured in my upcoming YouTube: My full week of vegan breakfasts 🎥 Waffleswithleila ❤️✨ sub to stay tuned! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Mid morning snack: I felt like an assortment of bits and bobs so I plonked on a plate, some @lotusbiscoffuk spread, corn pop chips, a fig and @rhythm108 new choc hazelnut chocolate ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Lunch: I had a brunch type thing! I made some pumpkin blueberry protein pancakes drizzled with @myproteinuk sugar free syrup, aswell as some scrambled tofu with spinach and a mix of 2 @lindamccartneyfoods chorizo sausages, red onion and sweet pepper seasoned together! ✨ the pancake and scrambled tofu recipe both can be found in my breakfast ebook (link is in my bio)! I just halved the recipe of each to make into another meal ✌🏼 2 in 1! Sweet and savoury ✅ ✨Dessert: @hartleysfruit strawberry no added sugar jelly and some fresh strawberries✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dinner: I had a mix of veg veggies that just needed using up in my fridge which I roasted, including courgette, butternut squash, green beans, tomatoes and mushrooms, I then made some soy mince (which I get from @hollandandbarrett ) that I mixed with some tomato purée and seasonings, I then served with a miso glazed aubergine (recipe can be found in a previous post already on my feed) pickled red cabbage and some fresh kale✨ Dessert: homemade quinoa and bulgar wheat mix chocolate pudding - I used 100g cooked quinoa and bulgar wheat mix with 5g cacao powder, some @natvialiving sweetner, 80ml almond milk and some frozen raspberries, I then topped it with some @roar_icecream_uk chocolate hemp ice cream 🤤👏🏼✨

🌿✨ SMAHSED AVO TOAST AND MISO GLAZED MUSHROOMS ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨I’m back with the mushrooooms! This time on top of smashed avo on toast 🤤 Such a dreamy combo! Please tell me you’ve tried it before!?! Soo good! I seasoned the mushrooms in some soy sauce, miso paste, sugar free syrup, garlic and onion powder ✨ I then placed them in a pan to crisp and topped on the avo!! Sprinkled with a bit of salt and pepper!! ✨ Love having this alongside a big bowl of salad, because if you can’t tell already, I’m a rabbit and could eat bowls of lettuce 🤪✨ Today will consist of a full bod workout, making use of our daily walk allowance and more chill time with the family in the garden soaking up the rays that the world is teasing us with during this isolation period!! Can’t complain though 😎✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Happy Saturday all!! Let me know if you’ve tried this combo before!! ✨🌿

🌿✨Sometimes flex...Othertimes relaxed... 🌚🙃✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Dont ever think I walk around like this or look like this when I’ve eaten a full day of food, it’s just not possible 😅 but why do I only share that aspect of my bod on my profile?! Because I use my platform to hopefully motivate people in some rational way! But of course that doesn’t mean I’m a walking around like Arnold Schwarzenegger all day ! Yes I’m physically lean because I work for it, you see photos of me in the best lighting I’ve hunted down, the best angle, me holding my breathe and flexing so hard for my abs and muscles to show! Does that make me “fake” or being “untrue” certainly not! We alll get full tummies after we’ve fed our bodies with love! It’s completely natural! ✨ Although it may seem that I’m always up and about, I do have times where I chill and just relax! Love your bod in every shape and form it comes in! It’s completely fine to have an aesthetic goal! I always preach that it’s a good thing to work towards if that’s something you want to do! But never feel pressured, compare yourself to others or discourage yourself! ✨ See this platform as as a platform to gain more knowledge and inspo from, not a battle between you and your mental state! ✨ we all have those times where we want to change things about ourselves because we’ve seen somebody else’s features, and like I say, it’s great to aspire to something but not okay for it to lead to hatred upon yourself! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ I really hope we’ve all had a bloody fabulous bank hol friyayyy! If it’s as sunny where you are as where I am, I hope you fully enjoyed it from your balcony, garden, local park in isolation 🥰I went for a stroll in my local rookery, and it was such a stress relief to get out, smell and see nature! I then had a lounge sesh in my garden before dinner, now I’m chilaxing with my younger sister watching a film with some schnackssss!! I went for a mix of @proper PB popcorn with @miiro_uk choc peanuts and @foxsbiscuits party rings 🤪 I also made myself a vegan hot choccc by mixing some almond milk with cacao powder and a @myproteinuk choc flavour drop! ✨🌿

🌿✨ BLUEBERRY MUFFIN OVERNIGHT OAT CAKE ✨ Macros: 550Kcals 55C 12F 50P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ If you couldn’t already tell already, I’m a big fan of these overnight cakes!! Who wouldn’t want a cake for breakfast 🤤 you may also wonder why I don’t just have a bowl of oats breakfast since I love oats sooo much! It’s just that I alsoo loveee being a creative bean for my breakfast in particular, it really sets me up for the day and brightens my mood! ✨ what’s your favourite meal of the day? Breakfast, lunch or dinner? 🙃 Let me know 👇🏼 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 55g oats , 100g frozen bloobs ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 40g @myproteinuk blueberry and cinnamon vegan blend protein powder ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ 10g @myproteinuk chia seeds ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ Enough water to make the batter thick (the idea is to have a firm mixture rather than something more runny when you’re having a bowl of oats) I just don’t really track how much water I put in 😅 I just eye ball it ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 5️⃣ Blueberry chia jam: 100g frozen blueberries mixed with 5g chia seeds in a pot until the blueberries are stewed and the chia seeds have absorbed the majority of the liquid. Leave to cool overnight and thicken further into a jam consistency. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl. Place in the microwave for 2 mins. Place in the fridge for the following morning. Flip on to a plate and top with love ❤️ I topped my Blueberry muffin overnight oatmeal cake with 3 tbsp of @nushfoods blueberry yogurt and some blueberry homemade chi jam on top 🤤 sooo good!! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ Homemade breaded tofu fillet with polenta chips, peas and spicy dip!✨ Macros for the meal: 378kcals 55C 8F 22P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ I recently discovered a pack of polenta at my local Tesco extra and being foodie, going to different restaurants and all, I always use to see “polenta” on some menus! Often in the form of a pudding or specialised bread! ✨ So I thought id be a creative nut and explore how I could use it! ✨ After doing a bit of a google search (whilst in the 80m que at Tesco to checkout my weekly shop items 🙃 relateable?) I discovered that you can do so many things with polenta!! ✨ I also read some nutritional benefits of it, such as; it’s high fibre and protein content, it’s low calorie and in particular fat, provides a source of complex carbs and vitamin A, it’s also gluten free! ✨ For dinner on this particular day, I went for polenta chips! All I did was cut up 150g of the block of polenta into wedges and seasoned them with paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic and onion powder, placed them on a baking tray lined with baking paper and baked them for 15 mins - no oil required, they still crisp and stay soft on the inside! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE for the tofu - 1 serve: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ I used 80g block of @tofooco firm tofu ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 1 slice of bread - toasted and blended into bread crumbs ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ 10ml soy sauce/ tamari/ coconut aminos ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ 10g flour ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Dip the tofu in the soy sauce and then the flour. Dip in soy sauce again and flour, repeat this process until it’s all used up. Finally dip and flip in the breadcrumbs! Place on a baking tray lined with baking paper and cook for 15-20mins on 180c! For the dip I mixed 1tbsp of tomato purée with cayenne pepper, smoked paprika and black pepper! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Have you tried polenta before? Let me know what you use it for!! I can’t wait to get more creative with it!!✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

Love how yummy and comforting it is! Its also a fabulous base of nutritious meal! I mixed 1 tbsp of @nushfoods with some garlic, onion powder and 2 packs of @myproteinuk konjac fettuccine noodles! I then added my greens of choice; steamed petite pois peas, kale and broccoli! On top I placed a grilled Portobello mushroom! ✨ My all time favouriteeee way to flavour mushrooms is by marinading them with 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sugar free syrup, some paprika, cayenne pepper and garlic powder! ✨ For this dish I cut up a Portobello mushroom into slices, seasoned it and then chargrilled in a pan ✨ Love how mushrooms can be a great foundation to a meal aswell! They’re so versatile and come in different forms, such as oyster mushrooms and shiitake, those two would definitely be my faves!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨How do you like to use cream cheese in a dish? 🌿✨ REVERSE DIETING✨ The method and concept of reverse dieting can be applied going up or down! It’s so useful but so underrated due to common misconceptions! ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Reverse dieting actually works on your metabolism. With reverse dieting, you’re slowly and steadily increasing or decreasing your calories while (hopefully) minimizing the amount of fat you gain or loose to allow your metabolism to adapt with what your goals are! Typically a reverse diet is employed after a caloric deficit where you’ll get to consume more calories without the extra weight once you’re done (this is a very slow and controlled process - not weeks but months of change and adaptation) ✨ but I also employ reverse dieting after a caloric surplus as I’ve found over the years, the more slower you are at creating a deficit - the better results you achieve and that’s because you’re giving your bod enough time! ✨ To be able to understand how to reverse diet and how your body functions as such, you must understand the difference between TDEE , BMR and the factors which play with someone’s caloric intake!✨ This lifestyle of “cutting” and “bulking” is not for everyone, I completely understand that but just respect how others choose to live their life! Personally I find both really effective in building and maintaining a strong but healthy looking physique in terms of aesthetics! ✨ I’m also well aware that aesthetics is not the ultimate goal or reason to why I love training, but I love working towards a goal so I do train to look how I want to look and that’s totally fine!! What’s not fine is being too hard on yourself, pressuring yourself to do things you don’t want to or just stressing out about it✌🏼 just know that everything takes time! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ I have many things to touch on for this topic, too much for an Instagram caption and the word limit 😅 so I’ll be making a YouTube video on this topic to refresh from my previous uploads and update/ inform you on my current knowledge and experience of it! 🎥 Waffleswithleila ✨ wearing @myproteinuk @officialmp snakeprint set! Such a cute set! Links in my bio with a discount code! ✨🌿

🌿✨ LOADED VEGAN NACHOS 🤤 ✨ Macros: 532kcals 63C 21F 24P✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ This is honestly one of the best lunches to make when you just want something comforting, filling and nutritious! 🤤 Nachos loaded with soy mince, veggies, vegan cheese and a drizzle of yogurt and herbs 👏🏼👏🏼 my kind of lunch!! ✨ Are you a nacho and dip kind of person or nahhhhh? ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ Mince filling: 80g soy mince, 15g tomato purée, some salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, paprika, garlic and onion powder - mixed and cooked in one pot (I get my soy mince from the frozen isle in Tesco - their own brand! I’m not a fan of quorn mince at all!! But I also get my soy mince dried in Holland and Barrett) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ Nachos: Fold 1 wrap into several quarters and cut into triangles. Season the triangles with your fave spices! Pop them in the oven to crisp for 5-10mins ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ Toppings: I shredded 30g @vio_lifefoods cheese on top with some chargrilled sweetcorn and coriander! Pop in the oven to allow the cheese to melt! I then drizzled on top 50g unsweetened soy yogurt! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ Guacamole: I smashed and mixed 45g of an avocado with some cherry tomatoes, red onion and garlic powder! And then placed that on top of the pile of yummmmmyness! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Assemble the layers together, And enjoyyy!! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ VEGAN JAPANESE INSPIRED SOUFFLÉ PROTEIN PANCAKES!! Topped with @alpro custard of course 😅✨ Macros (without toppings): 387kcals 41C 8F 37P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Basicallllllyy!! Im really missing going out and exploring the amazing cafes in London so I decided to be a cafe chef for my self 😅 these pancakes are inspired by a cafe in London called @fuwafuwalondon ! I’ve always wanted to visit! However, their pancakes are not vegan, I just think they look epicc! Do we agreee? Have you visited this cafe before? Let me know! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE (makes 6 soufflé pancakes for one!) : ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 60g flour ( I used spelt but you may use gluten free, plain or self raising, not almond or coconut flour) 2️⃣ 30g @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate (or vegan protein alternative, whey is a different consistency and will alter the recipe!) 3️⃣ 150ml @alpro unsweetened almond milk (or plant based milk alternative - soy, oat, coconut) 4️⃣ 5g coconut oil 5️⃣ 10g @natvialiving sweetner ( can be substituted for a dry sweetener alternative or sugar, but sugar will alter the macros) 6️⃣ 1/2 tsp baking powder, some salt, a squeeze of a lemon ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Combine the almond milk with the baking powder, salt and lemon juice. Melt there coconut oil and combine with the liquid mixture. Combine the dry ingredients together. Whisk whisk whisk the two mixtures together! To make the foil shaped rings to form the Soufflé style pancakes, I rolled out 6 pieces of foil. For each piece I rolled lengthways to form 6 rectangles. I then formed them into mini circles by stapling together the ends of the desired shape! (Alternatively if you have cookie cutters the same size you can use those, the only benefit of the foil, is that you can cut on around the edges once complete to prevent damage to the pancakes!) Then, heat a non stick pan, place the pancake batter in the 6 mini rings. Cook on one side, place a lid on top to allow the mixture to rise! Flip to cook on the other side! Then addd alll the toppings in the world and share them with me by tagging me in your recreations!! ❤️✨

🌿✨ Goal Setting ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Big or small, setting goals are a fabulous way to work towards something and stay motivated! Fitness, non fitness related, goals can be short term, goals can be long term, future goals and current goals! I like setting goals as I love to feel like Ive achieved something, so that I can look back on and feel accomplished! However, I suggest setting goals that you can manage, able to stick to and are reachable! I often think of a goal, but it’s more likely a dream just because it’s probably something out of my reach! I thought I’d share a few of mine, some more current than others: ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Current: I’ve set myself a goal to cycle to work at least one day during the week instead of taking public transport! I’ve set one day, typically a Thursday because I know if I set all my 5 day working week to cycle, it wouldn’t be manageable or I just won’t stick to it! This is along side sticking to my current 6 days a week training split which I mentioned in my previous post! I’ve also set a goal, on days that I have off work, to perform a 30 min LISS cardio session (walk on the treadmill) before breakfast! Both I’ve been able to stick to for several weeks, so I’d like to keep reaching the goals I set until they’re Integrated within my routine! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 Future: Id say these were more dreams than goals but I thought I’d share anyway, as I would like to think dreams can come true and it can potentially happen 🤣😅 I would love love loveee the opportunity to work with a brand and to come up with and create a product/ add a flavour to their current products, with them that is available in supermarkets and would have my face on the back 🙃 orrr have my own instagrammable breakfast cafe which people would purposefully visit to get photos for the gram... can you imagine 👏🏼 goalssss! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ Let me know what your goals are, small or big! I’d love to know and It would be a great read to others aswell! ✨ btw I cut these @myproteinuk @officialmp leggings into cycling shorts and they’re cute af ✨👏🏼🌿

🌿✨ Biscoff overnight bowl cake 🤤 My mouth is drooling as I describe it! ✨ Macros: 546kcals 57C 14F 47P ✨ #lotusbiscoff #biscoff #oats ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Pals, friends, dudes, peeeps! 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼 if you are not a fan of @lotusbiscoffuk ... I’m sorry we can’t be friends 🤣 has anyone else tried the new sandwich biscuits? 🤯🤤 I’ve probably had at least one thing to do with @lotusbiscoffuk nearly everyday 🤪 it’s sooo addictive! Can anyone relate because I’m sure I’m not the only one on the @lotusbiscoffuk boat ? 😅😂 For those that have lately popped the question related to how I eat “unhealthy” foods and remain pretty lean, nothing is healthy or unhealthy to an extent. Keeps me Alive 🙃✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 55g Oats ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 40g @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 3️⃣ 10g chia seeds ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 4️⃣ Enough water to make a thick batter ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 5️⃣ 1 sandwich @lotusbiscoffuk biscuit ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 5️⃣ 1 tbsp (15g) @lotusbiscoffuk spread ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: mix all of the ingredients in a bowl (besides the two toppings) l, heat it in the microwave for 2 mins. Leave overnight. Flip onto a plate the following day. Spread and top with all things @lotusbiscoffuk because it tastes like heavennnnnn 👏🏼👏🏼 you can either re heat it the following morning or consume cold - I recommend cold 🤤 cake for breakfast anyday please! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ 2 INGREDIENTS single serve Vegan Cauliflower buffalo bites with tomato dip! ✨ Total Macros: 227Kcals 26C 4F 11P✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Looking for a savoury snack? Or a side as part of a main meal!! I made these cauliflower bites which only involve 2 ingredients 👏🏼 I had them as part of my dinner as their so low in kcals, but you can have them as a snack if you’re a savoury snacking queen (you know I’m team schweeet) ✨ when ever I go out to eat in a restaurant (which seems like a century a go now 😅) theres almost always an option for vegans that involves cauliflower!! ✨ Cauliflower can be used in soo many different ways, in sweet and savoury dishes - and the great thing about it is that it adds volume and nutritional value into your dish!! ✨ A few examples: cauliflower oats, adding cauliflower as part of a smoothie bowl, cauliflower popcorn, cauliflower steak, whole head roasted cauliflower... the list is endless!! ✨ so this is what I thought of! Cauliflower bites! Enjoy!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE makes 6 bites for one: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 1️⃣ 100g cooked cauliflower (raw or frozen) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 2️⃣ 50g chickpea flour (also known as basen or gram flour) - it will also work with all purpose flour or gluten free ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👉🏼 For the dip: 1 tbsp tomato purée mixed with paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic and onion powder! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: once the cauliflower is cooked, mash it up and combine with the flour! Add salt, pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic and onion powder to season/ taste! Roll into bite sized portions, place on a baking tray with non stick baking paper and cook in the oven for 15-20mins on 180c until crisp! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go by tagging me in your posts and stories!! ❤️ lots of love xox ✨🌿

🌿✨ FULL DAY OF EATING ✨ Hope you’ve all had a lovely Sunday!! Let me know what you’ve all been up to! ❤️✨ total macros as part of my reverse diet (explained on my YouTube): 1800kcals 218C 48F 122P ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Breakfast: I had my mini vegan soufflé Japanese inspired pancakes drizzled with some @alpro vanilla custard and topped with blooberries!! I’ll be uploading the recipe soooon 👀👀 they were fabulous! Considering doing different varied flavoured recipes for them too! ✨ I also had a @rawpress tumeric shot ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Mid morning snack: two pieces of toast, one topped with 1 tbsp of @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate protein powder mixed with water to make a protein cream, a banana and @manilife_ peanut butter , the other slice topped with @nushfoods caramel and hibiscus yogurt topped with dark chocolate chips and frozen raspberries!! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Lunch: I had an idea of making curry pockets so I used one whole wrap to make four triangular vegan curry pockets by splitting the wrap into a quarter and filling them with homemade curry! I then sealed the pockets with the end of a fork and popped them in the oven for 10 mins to crisp. For the curry I used 100g soy mince, some grated carrots, peas, courgette and spinach with tomato purée and curry seasoning! I served the pockets with the remaining curry and some extra spinach ✨Dessert: I had @breyersdelightsuk vegan chocolate hazelnut ice cream with frozen berries and I also made a hot chocolate using 1 cup almond milk heated in the microwave, 1 tsp of cacao powder and sweetened with 1 drop of a @myproteinuk whites chocolate flavour drop ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Dinner: I baked some tofu, polenta chips, Portobello mushroom and sweet pepper, served with kale, red cabbage, broccoli and green beans ✨ I’ve never tried polenta before, so I thought I’d give them a go = 🤤🤤! ✨ For dessert I made a one serve fudgy ball using 10g @myproteinuk powdered peanut butter, 5g agave nectar and 5g cacao powder, mixed with 3 tbsp water to form a ball. I then rolled it in some cacao nibs!✨ for extra texture!! ✨ per ball: 92kcals 8C 4F 6P ✨

🌿✨APPLE PIE PROTEIN PRETZEL BITES✨ Macros in total: 258kcals 40C 2F 20P, per ball: 86kcals ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ On the weekends, I tend to have the same routine, which I’ll be filming and sharing on my YouTube soon! But just to give a bit of background, I have breakfast, chill for a bit, make my pre workout snack and workout! As there’s more than enough time in the world right now, rather than having convenient packaged snacks, I like to make my own! Don’t get me wrong, I love love love my @myproteinuk baked cookies and carb crushers, but I also love making my own snacks too! ✨ I had these apple pie bites I thought of making, the other week, and I loved them so I thought I’d share them with you 🥰✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ - Dough: 35g flour, 15g @myproteinuk vanilla soy isolate, 30g unsweetened soy yogurt ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀- Filling: 100g chopped apple, 60ml almond milk, @myproteinuk vanilla sugar free syrup, some cinnamon ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ - Coating: @natvialiving sweetener mixed with loads of cinnamon 🤤 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: To make the filling, place the chopped apple and other ingredients in a pot and leave until the apples are stewed and softened. Leave the filling to cool! Meanwhile, form the dough by mixing the relative ingredients! Separate into 3 circles and flatten on a non stick surface. Place the apple pie filling in the centre and form a ball of dough with the filling. Place the coating ingredients in a bowl and roll the balls in the coating. Place the balls on a non stick baking tray and heat them in the oven for 20mins on 180c. You will have remaining filling - I chose to have it on the side with the balls for extra! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Let me know if you give this recipe a go!! It was super duper yummy! ❤️ my discount link for @myproteinuk is in my bio with a discount code! ✨🌿

🌿✨ Pesto pasta with roasted courgette, seasoned kale and petit pois peas, using my faaave pesto from @zest.plantpower 🤤 ✨ Listen people CARBS ARE LIFE 👏🏼✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨I can’t even record the number of messages I’ve received about carbs, requests for lower carb recipes and low carb diets in relation to weight loss! I often get people saying they’re confused how I can eat so many carbs and remain lean, it’s pretty simple! Carbs by them selves don’t determine if you loose weight or not. Carbs are one of three essential macronutrients ! No macronutrients is superior, each plays a vital role in your body and how it functions. Restricting your bod to such an extent from a certain micronutrient is not going to benefit you. So things like “keto” “Atkins” and all these gibberish diets are not more beneficial than a basic diet. What matters in every way shape and form is your caloric intake! You eat more, you gain, you eat less, you loose (in veryyy basic terms - it doesn’t happen with a click of a finger , it’s a slow and controlled process for each). Understandably, everyone is different and how your body may react to a certain macronutrient split will vary, but for the average person, it doesn’t apply! ✨ personally I’ve always followed 50/25/25 macro split regardless as to whether I’m trimming or gaining! ✨ But in saying that, like I said, it’s your calories which matter most! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ what’s your opinion? Do you follow a certain split! Let a gal know 👇🏼👇🏼✨🌿

🌿✨ Tortilla nacho HACK for a yummy lunch! ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨Love love love a bowl of nachos with some Dip, one including my love... guacamole 🤤 I like to use whole tortilla wraps, fold them, cut them into smaller triangles to make nachos and flavour them my self! @press_healthfoods kindly gifted me their vegan bean chilli along with a number of their sauce and soup sachets which I used in this bowl! So I decided to use my own “nachos” to spice up my lunch! ✨ You can even use the nachos in a taco bowl, which is what I did in my new YouTube video where I swap diets with my mum for the day ❤️📹 go check it out! ✨ Once I cut the tortilla wrap into nachos, I placed them on a baking tray lined with baking paper and seasoned them with salt, pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic and onion powder. I then popped them in the oven for 5mins on 180c until crispyyy and added them to my bowl!✨ I also like to make my own guacamole! All I do is smash half an avocado, cut up some cherry tomatoes, red onion and combined them all together in a bowl along with salt, pepper and garlic powder! I also topped with some @nushfoods almond yogurt for a fresh touch on the chilli! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿✨ QUESTION FOR YOU! What is your favourite dip? Bbq, ketchup, burger sauce, mayo, mustard, salsa .... let me know!! Mine would have to be hummus or guac 🤤 ✨🌿

🌿✨Whipped chocolate coffee oats!✨ When you put two and two together to power you through the morning! ✨ #whippedcoffee #oats ✨🌿 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✨ Oats are a fabulous source of slow release energy chemically! Caffeine improves energy levels by blocking an inhibitory neurotransmitter in your brain, which causes a stimulant effect via hormones, as caffeine is absorbed into your blood stream and travels to the brain! ✨ I’m sure we all know by now the fab tik tok whipped coffee trend, and if you haven’t, have you been self isolating under a rock? 😅🙃 ✨ I thought I’d be an experimental bean and combine my love of both into one by making a chocolate oatmeal bowl topped with chocolate chips, some @nushfoods almond yogurt and whipped coffeee!! ✨ defooo recommend whipping this up 👏🏼 no pun intended 🙃! ✨ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 📖 RECIPE: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ - 2 tbsp instant coffee - 2 tbsp @natvialiving sweetener (I use stevia instead of actual sugar and it still works!) - 2 tbsp hot water ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 👩‍🍳 Method: Combine all the bits and bobs in a small bowl and whisk until your hand falls off...just a pre warning that it may take up to 5 mins for the mixture to become foamy but don’t give it up aha! It’s worth it aha! For the oats I used 60g oats, 30g @myproteinuk dark chocolate vegan blend 5g chia seeds and chocolate @alpro almond milk! ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 🌿 ✨ Are you a fan of the tik tok whipped coffee trend? Let me know!! What other tik tok food trends are you digging??✨ Save this recipe, give it a go and Let me know ❤️✨🌿
